progression_balancing.description:
A system that can move progression earlier, to try and prevent the player from getting stuck and bored early.
A lower setting means more getting stuck. A higher setting means less getting stuck.

accessibility.description:
Set rules for reachability of your items/locations.
Locations: ensure everything can be reached and acquired.
Items: ensure all logically relevant items can be acquired.
Minimal: ensure what is needed to reach your goal can be acquired.

priority_locations.description: Prevent these locations from having an unimportant item

continues.description:
number of continues before game over

game over teleports you to your ship, keeping items and open doors

floppy_req.description: how many floppy disks are required

gun_levels.description:
Zillion gun power for the number of Zillion power ups you pick up

For "restrictive", Champ is the only one that can get Zillion gun power level 3.

jump_levels.description:
jump levels for each character level

For "restrictive", Apple is the only one that can get jump level 3.

randomize_alarms.description: whether to randomize the locations of alarm sensors

max_level.description: the highest level you can get

opas_per_level.description:
how many Opa-Opas are required to level up

Lower makes you level up faster.

id_card_count.description:
how many ID Cards are in the game

Vanilla is 63

maximum total for all items is 144

bread_count.description:
how many Breads are in the game

Vanilla is 33

maximum total for all items is 144

opa_opa_count.description:
how many Opa-Opas are in the game

Vanilla is 26

maximum total for all items is 144

zillion_count.description:
how many Zillion gun power ups are in the game

Vanilla is 6

maximum total for all items is 144

floppy_disk_count.description:
how many Floppy Disks are in the game

Vanilla is 5

maximum total for all items is 144

scope_count.description:
how many Scopes are in the game

Vanilla is 4

maximum total for all items is 144

red_id_card_count.description:
how many Red ID Cards are in the game

Vanilla is 1

maximum total for all items is 144

early_scope.description: make sure Scope is available early

skill.description: the difficulty level of the game

starting_cards.description:
how many ID Cards to start the game with

Refilling at the ship also ensures you have at least this many cards.
0 gives vanilla behavior.

room_gen.description: whether to generate rooms with random terrain
